name: ProPresenter Playlist File
summary: Playlist created by ProPresenter, a media package used for creating multimedia presentations used by churches and sports stadiums; saves an XML playlist consisting of audio, video, and .PRO5 files but does not include the referenced files (only .PRO5PLX files will include the audio and video files in the bundle); used for transferring presentation playlists between computers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
